text: Glenn Wilke Jr. is a collegiate level basketball coach, with 700 victories in 33 seasons.Former Stetson coach, oldest son at top of NCAA wins list He initially started coaching in Winter Park, Florida an NCAA Division II school. He is currently a coach for the Rollins College Tars. where he has a 700–252 record.Hall of Fane: Glenn Wilkes Jr. – Rollins College, Basketball Coach His father, Glenn Wilkes Sr., is a Hall of Fame basketball coach. == References == Category:American women's basketball coaches Category:Living people Category:Stetson Hatters men's basketball players Category:Rollins Tars coaches Category:American men's basketball players Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Glenn Wilkes Jr.
